trending.abstract: Submitted by daixufang  Agent Lightning is a flexible RL framework for training LLMs in various agents, using a hierarchical RL algorithm and decoupling execution from training to handle complex interactions. 8 authors · Published on Aug 5,

trending.abstract: Submitted by taesiri  The Qwen3-TTS series presents advanced multilingual text-to-speech models with voice cloning and controllable speech generation capabilities, utilizing dual-track LM architecture and specialized speech tokenizers for e

trending.title: Scaling Large-Language-Model-based Multi-Agent Collaboration
trending.abstract: Multi-agent collaboration networks enhance collective intelligence, outperforming baselines across various topologies and showing emergent abilities earlier than neural scaling laws suggest. 10 authors · Published on Jun 11, 2024 Upvote 3 G

trending.title: Multi-Agent Collaboration via Evolving Orchestration
trending.abstract: A centralized orchestrator dynamically directs LLM agents via reinforcement learning, achieving superior multi-agent collaboration in varying tasks with reduced computational costs. 14 authors · Published on May 26, 2025 Upvote 4 GitHub 29.

trending.title: Bitnet.cpp: Efficient Edge Inference for Ternary LLMs
trending.abstract: Bitnet.cpp enhances edge inference for ternary LLMs using a novel mixed-precision matrix multiplication library, achieving significant speed improvements over baselines. 10 authors · Published on Feb 17, 2025 Upvote 5 GitHub 27.7k arXiv Pag
